title: Divergence Based Quadrangle and Applications. (arXiv:2306.16525v1 [q-fin.RM])
abstract: This paper introduces a novel framework for assessing risk and decision-making in the presence of uncertainty, the \emph{$\varphi$-Divergence Quadrangle}. This approach expands upon the traditional Risk Quadrangle, a model that quantifies uncertainty through four key components: \emph{risk, deviation, regret}, and \emph{error}. The $\varphi$-Divergence Quadrangle incorporates the $\varphi$-divergence as a measure of the difference between probability distributions, thereby providing a more nuanced understanding of risk. Importantly, the $\varphi$-Divergence Quadrangle is closely connected with the distributionally robust optimization based on the $\varphi$-divergence approach through the duality theory of convex functionals. To illustrate its practicality and versatility, several examples of the $\varphi$-Divergence Quadrangle are provided, including the Quantile Quadrangle. The final portion of the paper outlines a case study implementing regression with the Entropic Value-at-Risk Qua

translated_title: 基于差异的四边形及其应用
translated_abstract: 该论文介绍了一种在不确定性存在的情况下评估风险和决策的新框架，即"Φ-差异四边形"。该方法在传统的风险四边形的基础上进行了扩展，风险四边形通过四个关键组成部分：风险、偏差、后悔和误差来量化不确定性。Φ-差异四边形将Φ-差异作为概率分布之间差异的度量，从而提供了更加细致的风险理解。重要的是，Φ-差异四边形与基于Φ-差异方法的分布鲁棒优化通过凸泛函的对偶理论紧密相关。为了说明其实用性和通用性，论文提供了Φ-差异四边形的几个示例，包括分位数四边形。论文的最后部分概述了一个实施以熵值风险为代价的回归的案例研究。
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种新的框架，Φ-差异四边形，用于在不确定性存在的情况下评估风险和决策。Φ-差异四边形通过将Φ-差异作为概率分布之间差异的度量，提供了更细致的风险理解。它与基于Φ-差异的分布鲁棒优化紧密相关，并且具有实践性和通用性。
